data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_0
data.text:
YES, I KILLED THEM. HOW ELSE
                COULD I GET WHAT I NEEDED-- SERUMS, GLANDULAR EXTRACTS, BLOOD...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_1
data.text: YOU'RE MAD-- STARK RAVING MAD! DO YOU THINK THIS CRAZY IDEA WILL WORK?

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_2
data.text: MAD, YOU SAY! YOU SHALL SEE HOW MAD I AM. YOU SHALL SEE WHAT NO MAN HAS SEEN BEFORE-- THE CREATION OF LIFE!

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_3
data.text:
IN AN AGONY OF APPREHENSION I
                STRAIND AT MY BONDS. SUDDENLY THEY
                SNAPPED...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_6
data.text:
BUT IT WAS TOO LATE! IT FELL
                AND EX- PLODED, SPARYING EVERYTHING
                WITH ITS CONTENTS...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_7
data.text: MY ELIXIR! MY LIFE'S WORK! I'LL KILL YOU FOR THIS!

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_9
data.text:
AS THE FRIGHTFUL LIQUID
                SETTLED ON THE DIS- MEMBERED PARTS OF THE BODIES
                IN THAT AWFUL ROOM A TERRIBLE THING
                HAPPENED...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_10
data.text: LOOK! LOOK! THE ...THE THINGS ARE ALIVE!

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_12
data.text:
WITH ONE ACCORD THE FRIGHTFUL
                THINGS WRITHED, WIGGLED, SQUIRMED
                TOWARD THE PROFESSOR...

data.name: FOX_CHILLINTALES_T17_016_13
data.text: THEY... THEY'RE COMING AFTER ME! --- NO! NO! STAY BACK!
